sendResetPasswordEmail.subject: Bianca Wellness - Password Reset Request
sendResetPasswordEmail.text:
Dear caregiver,

We received a request to reset your Bianca Wellness account password.

To reset your password, please click the link below:

%s

This reset link will expire in 1 hour for security purposes.

If you did not request a password reset, please ignore this email. Your account remains secure.

Best regards,
The Bianca Wellness Team

---
Bianca Wellness - Secure Healthcare Communication
This email was sent from a verified domain: biancawellness.com

sendVerificationEmail.subject: Bianca Wellness - Please Verify Your Email Address
sendVerificationEmail.text:
Dear caregiver,

Thank you for creating your Bianca Wellness account! To complete your registration and ensure account security, please verify your email address.

Click the link below to verify your email:

%s

This verification link will expire in 24 hours for security purposes.

If you did not create a Bianca Wellness account, please ignore this email.

Welcome to secure healthcare communication!

Best regards,
The Bianca Wellness Team

---
Bianca Wellness - Secure Healthcare Communication
This email was sent from a verified domain: biancawellness.com

inviteEmail.subject: Welcome to Bianca Wellness - Invitation to Join
inviteEmail.text:
Dear caregiver,

You have been invited to join Bianca Wellness, a secure platform for healthcare communication.

To accept your invitation and set up your account, please click the link below:

%s

This invitation will expire in 7 days for security purposes.

If you did not expect this invitation, please ignore this email.

Best regards,
The Bianca Wellness Team

---
Bianca Wellness - Secure Healthcare Communication
This email was sent from a verified domain: biancawellness.com

emailVerifiedPage.title: Email Verified!
emailVerifiedPage.message: Your Bianca Wellness account has been successfully verified.
emailVerifiedPage.messageAlreadyVerified: Your email is already verified. You can proceed to login.

emailVerificationFailedPage.title: Verification Failed
emailVerificationFailedPage.messageInvalid: This verification link is invalid or has expired.
emailVerificationFailedPage.helpExpired: Please request a new verification email from the login screen.
emailVerificationFailedPage.helpGeneric: If you believe this is an error, please contact support.

smsVerification.message: Your Bianca verification code is: %s. This code expires in 10 minutes.
